total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the locations of 2s and 3s in the input grid.
Q2: Count the number of 2s and 3s in the grid.
Q3: Create a new grid of size 3x3.
Q4: If there are more than one 2s, place a 1 in the top left corner of the new grid.
Q5: If there are more than one 3s, place a 1 in the top right corner of the new grid.
Q6: If there are both 2s and 3s, place a 1 in the bottom right corner of the new grid.
Q7: Fill the rest of the new grid with 0s.
